about_the_game:
Party like it's 20XX with the eighth track of the Capcom Arcade Stadium: Mini-Album, "Battle Circuit - Opening"!

This hype-up track is the opening theme of Battle Circuit, one of the titles included in Capcom Arcade Stadium!

Don't miss out on some nostalgic favorites!
